f, axarr = plt.subplots(6, 5, figsize=(24, 22))

curr_row = 0
for i in range(30):
    example = cv2.imread(test_list[i])
    example = example[:,:,::-1]
    
    col = i%6
    axarr[col, curr_row].imshow(example)
